original_text: The Lord will give you many children. Your animals will have many babies. Your fields will give you a lot of food. The Lord will do this in the land that he promised your ancestors he would give you.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네게 주리라고 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 땅에서 네게 복을 주사 네 몸의 소생과 가축의 새끼와 토지의 소산을 많게 하시며

sentences.original_text: The Lord will give you many children
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 너에게 많은 자녀를 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Your animals will have many babies
sentences.korean_translation: 네 가축들이 많은 새끼를 낳을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Your fields will give you a lot of food
sentences.korean_translation: 네 밭이 너에게 많은 음식을 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the land that he promised your ancestors
